SELECT total_statusNo AS totalStatusNo, statusDate, total_users AS totalUsers, total_companies AS totalCompanies, total_recruitmentNoticeCnt AS totalRecruitmentNoticeCnt, total_registration AS totalRegistration, total_reviewBoard AS totalReviewBoard FROM total_status WHERE statusDate BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO total_status ( statusDate, total_users, total_companies, total_recruitmentNoticeCnt, total_registration, total_reviewBoard ) VALUES ( #{statusDate}, #{totalUsers}, #{totalCompanies}, #{totalRecruitmentNoticeCnt}, #{totalRegistration}, #{totalReviewBoard} )
